casebody.data:
Lester Daniel BRYSON and John Frank Bowen
v.
STATE of North Carolina, Department of Correction Secretary Theodis Beck and Combined Records Manager Judy Sills. No. 399P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Lester Daniel Bryson, Pro Se. John Frank Bowen, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of October 2003 by Defendant in this matter for Rehearing and En Banc by the Full Supreme Court Justices, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: "Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
